title: EUNE My club not showing up, even though i'm leader.
body: Hi, my club is not showing up even though i'm the leader of it. I saw that you fix things...so well :D

replies.body: Ahhh, yes. Clubs issues like this we can resolve if you reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will be happy to assist from there.
